author: Matt Wolfe
description:
The secret is out…

I’ve officially switched to Comet as my new default browser.

These are just some of the ways I’ve been using it:
💬 Summarize thousands of product reviews into digestible pros and cons
💰 Compare prices instantly across the web
▶️ Jump to exact moments inside YouTube videos
㊙️ Translate & summarize articles
✉️ And draft email replies

And it’s free on macOS and Windows.

Try Perplexity Comet browser today at https://www.perplexity.ai/comet

But fair warning: once you switch, normal browsers will start to feel a bit… prehistoric 🦕

#AI #Comet #Perplexity #AItools
title: How I Personally Use AI Browsers
